name: boolean
description: A boolean value, either '0' for FALSE or '1' for TRUE.

name: gameMode
description: Describes the game mode that was started.

name: gmMode
description: Describes the game master mode that was started.

name: arenaMode
description: Describes the arena mode that was started.

name: level
description: The name of a level as given when creating a level

name: difficulty
description: A numeric value describing the difficulty.

name: globalFlag
description: The name of the global flag.

name: partyFlag
description: The name of the party flag.

name: userFlag
description: The name of the user flag.

name: objectFlag
description: The name of the object flag.

name: dialog
description: The name of the dialog. Equals the file name without the extension.

name: dialogVariable
description: The name of the dialog variable.

name: dialogCategory
description: The name of the dialog category as selected in the category dropdown of the dialog editor.

name: dialogLocalFlag
description: The name of the local flag.

name: voiceBark
description: The name of the voice bark. Equals the file name without the extension.

name: sound
description: The name of the sound asset. Equals the resource name as found in the resource manager.

name: music
description: The name of the music asset. Equals the resource name as found in the resource manager.

name: damageType
description: The type of the applied damage.

name: damageSource
description: The source of the applied damage.

name: tag
description: The name of the tag as defined in the tag manager in the editor.

name: skill
description: The name of the skill. A skill name consists of the skill type and name concatenated by an underscore as found in the stats editor. E.g. the skill name of the skill 'EnemyFireball' of the type 'Projectile' is 'Projectile_EnemyFireball'.

name: skillType
description: The type of the cast skill.

name: skillElement
description: The element the skill belongs to.

name: status
description: The name of the status as defined in the status data tables in the stats editor.

name: statusType
description: The base type of the status.

name: surface
description: The type name of the surface.

name: surfaceLayer
description: The target surface layer.

name: surfaceLayerString
description: The target surface layer.

name: surfaceTransform
description: The surface transformation type.

values.label: Turns a cloud into a ground-layer surface.
Turns a ground-layer surface into a cloud.
Turns water and blood into poison.

name: quest
description: The name of a quest as defined in the journal editor.

name: questState
description: The name of a quest state as defined in the journal editor.

name: questCategory
description: The name of a quest category as defined in the journal editor.

name: questBroadcast
description: The broadcast level of a quest.

name: questMystery
description: The name of a mystery as defined in the journal editor.

name: recipe
description: The name of a recipe as defined in the ItemCombos table in the stats editor.

name: treasure
description: The name of a treasure table as defined in the TreasureTable in the stats editor.

name: waypoint
description: The name of a waypoint as defined in the journal editor.

name: marker
description: The name of a map marker as defined in the journal editor.

name: animation
description: The name of an animation. Must be defined in the animation set of the target character.

name: animationLoop
description: The name of a looping animation. Must be defined in the animation set of the target character.

name: animationSet
description: The name of an animation set. Equals the name of the animation set found in the resource manager.

name: storyEvent
description: The name of the story event.

name: characterItemEvent
description: The name of the character/item event.

name: characterCharacterEvent
description: The name of the character/character event.

name: gameEvent
description: The name of the game event.

name: textEvent
description: The name of the text event.

name: teleportMovieEvent
description: The name of the teleport event.

name: behaviorReaction
description: The name of the behavior reaction.

name: behaviorVariable
description: The name of the behvior variable.

name: moveID
description: The identifier of a move operation.

name: slotname
description: The name of an equipment slot.

name: homesteadKeyState
description: Defines the state of the fast travel button in the players ui.

name: key
description: The name of a key.

name: race
description: The name of a race.

name: deathType
description: The death type.

name: faction
description: The name of the faction as defined in the faction editor.

name: instrument
description: The name of an origin instrument.

name: ability
description: The name of an ability.

name: attribute
description: The name of an attribute.

name: talent
description: The name of a talent.

name: effect
description: The name of an effect. Equals the name of the effect in the resource manager.

name: effectHandle
description: A custom handle that identifies an effect instance.

name: effectBone
description: The name of the bone an effect should be attached to. Must exist on the target object.

name: customBook
description: The name of a custom book.

name: customBookEntry
description: The name of a custom book entry.

name: fadeID
description: An identifier for the fade.

name: uiError
description: The internal name of the error message to show.

name: uiReadyCheck
description: An identifier for the ready check.

name: database
description: The name of a database.

name: goal
description: The name of a goal.

name: timer
description: An identifier for the timer.

name: itemTemplate
description: The name of the item template. Consists of the name and GUID of the root template concatenated by an underscore.

name: characterTemplate
description: The name of the character template. Consists of the name and GUID of the root template concatenated by an underscore.
